hero.title: Professional and Trusted Midwifery Services
hero.subtitle: Providing the best health services with complete facilities and experienced midwives, officially partnered with the ITSK Soepraoen Malang Campus.

about.title: About Us
about.description: TPMB Nina Rahayu is committed to providing professional and trusted maternal and child health services. Our commitment to service quality is also demonstrated through a strategic partnership with ITSK Soepraoen Malang. As an official educational partner, we are trusted as a clinical practice (internship) site for Midwifery students to hone their clinical competencies.

items.title: Pregnancy Checkup (ANC)
items.desc: Serving ultrasound with various types (2D, 3D, 4D) by Certified Doctors to monitor fetal development in detail.

items.title: Maternal & Child Health
items.desc: Providing Maternal and Child Health Checks with a professional approach, from pregnancy to toddler development.

items.title: Family Planning (KB)
items.desc: Providing consultation and contraceptive installation (Injection, Pill, Implant, IUD) according to family needs.

partner.title: Our Partners
partner.content_title: Building a Generation of Professional Midwives
partner.desc: We believe that field experience is the best teacher. Through an exclusive partnership with ITSK Soepraoen, we dedicate our facilities as a real laboratory for future midwives.
partner.quote: We greatly appreciate to Nina's comprehensive guidance, from technical competency and professional values â€‹â€‹to adapting to the digital age. Her active support in ensuring the smooth running of the practice makes this a top-notch clinical learning environment for our students.
partner.rektor_name: Raden Maria Veronika, S.ST,. M. Keb
